title: 2 Minute
lyrics:
She just want me for a minute
Okay okay let me flip it, switch it, change it up
I don't really give a fuck
Gon' and watch me fuck it up
Imma switch gears on you for a minute

Coming to see you just for a minute (just for a minute)

Got me this water we dabbing in it

You got scars on you baby, they need some fixing

I just want time with your heart for a minute

Come fuck with my campaign when you get a second

Imma call yo phone when I get a second

You can slide through as soon as I'm finished



She just want me for a minute

Okay okay let me flip it, switch it, change it up

I don't really give a fuck

Gon' and watch me fuck it up

(x2)



Gon' and watch me fuck it up

They don't never really want me anyway

I don't now how to feel anyway
